title: Paalam Lyrics Kaththi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Paalam Kottu Kottu melam
Singer: Shankar Mahadhevan, Swheta Mohan
Music: Anirudh
Movie: KaththiÂ 

Kottu kottu melam kottu
kattu kattu paalam kattu
idhayatha idhayathukku
inaikka paalam kattu

Mars-la ivan porandha
venus-la iva porandha
grahanga renduthukkum
irukkum paalam

Sorgathula marameduththu
kattuna paalam thaan
muththathula katti vacha
paalam kadhal thaan.

Kadhal oru medhava medhava paalam
adhu illa nenjukulla mirugam mirugam vaadum

andakula adhipadhi neeye
namo namo naaraayanaaya
thondakulam pottrum unnaye
namo namo

Oh thunbam inga
oru karai thaan
inbam anga maru karaithaan
rendukkum maththiyila
odum paalam edhu

Kovilula kalleduththa
bhakthiyila solleduthu
kattina paalam idhu
saami paalam adhu.

Paavam senjaa karakaluva
ninaikkum boomithaan
paavaththa nee unarndhuputta
neeyum saamithaan

Saami oru
kurukku kurukku paalam
adhu illena
boomi ingae
kirukku kirukku kolam

humpy dumpy anga falling down
jack n jillu inga rolling down
londan bridge is ayyo fallingaaa
ringa ringa all fall down.

Neththu verum irul mayamthaan
naalai adhu olimayam thaan.
nalla oru edhirkaalathuthukku
pogum paalam edhu.

Kurumbula irumbeduthu
arivula narambeduthu
ezhuppunena paalam idhu
kulandha paalam

Vaanathula meen pidichu
rasikkum vayasuthaan
ellarukkum venum andha
kulandha manasuthaan

kulandhainga kanavu kanavu paalam
adhil ponaale kannu munne
oliyum olirum kaalam

Kuthukalle pole nindaane
puttukinu poyeputtaney
ettukaalu poochi aattamthaan
naasamaai nadandhu varaaaney

Porappudhum oru nodithaan
erappadhum oru nodithaan
sollladi niyanaponne
rendum paalam edhu

anju mootta pooveduthu
nerathula naar eduthu
kattuna paalam edhu
vaazhkka paalam adhu

paadhiyila mullirukkum
kuththuna kathaadhe
beer-adichi ninna kooda
adhuvum kuthaathe

vazhkka adhu
poovula kattuna paalam
nee sethaalum
seththu vecha puniyam
ennaikkum vaazhum
